place.name: LASHAM
place.gazetteerText: LASHAM, a parish, with a village, in Alton district, Hants; 4 miles NW of Alton r. station. Post-town, Alton. Acres, 1,769. Real property, £1,296. Pop., 235. Houses, 49. The property belongs to F. J. E. Jervoise, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Winchester. Value, £324.* Patron, F. J. E. Jervoise, Esq. The church is being rebuilt. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
